item.description:
We will meet up with Al-rs Group
THE BAND
Formed in 1986, the Floyd Patterson Band has been regarded by many over the years to be a Pioneer Valley favorite. With material ranging from the 1950s to present, the group always brings home their own style of quality performance .Whether "old school" or "new school" music , state fairs or private situations, the Floyd Patterson Band never fails to keep their audiences satisfied. As evidenced by the awards they've received in past years.

The Park:
Its also good to make food right there on site, and i usually bring the grillo to this spot for some cooking
something. Iits available for others in the group too..
I do what i can to keep people from complaining by having the grill in our immediate area and away from the crowd.

Bring your chairs, blankets, bug spray, food and your own favourite bug juice, a lot of us share our stuff with the others so offer some to your fellow attendees too.

Rain cancels the *MEETUP* event, (The performers usually play inside if it rains) since i dont like the indoors things, you can go, i like the event "outside" so we can socialize and get to meet each other and move around freely.

Think of it this way, ITS THE SOCIALIZATION AND INTERACTION BETWEEN THE PEOPLE THAT MAKES THE EVENT, NOT necessarily THE MUSIC, THE MUSIC IS THE BACKGROUND ! but we pick music most would enjoy and if you want to go up to the front also.

I update as the weather approaches on the day
i try to get there before 5:30 but that depends on traffic..etc..so its an apx time.
If you get there early, check out the gardens..

Getting There:

Elizabeth Park is located at the corner of Prospect Avenue and Asylum Avenue on the Hartford / West Hartford line.

I-84 West bound to Exit 48 (Asylum Street).

Stay to the Right on Asylum.

Follow for approximately 1.8 miles.

Turn left into the park (1555 Asylum Avenue, West Hartford). 06117

Park where you see it, its not that bad. but you may have to look a bit if you are late..


I-84 East bound to Exit 44 (Prospect Ave)

Straight thru stop sign.

Left at light onto Prospect.

Follow approximately 1.8 miles.

Entrance on Left (915 Prospect, Hartford)

Park where you find a place.
item.how_to_find_us: In the back by the Gazebo

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Floyd Paterson Band
